mapper.insert: insert into product(name, brand_id, category1_id, category2_id, category3_id, unit_name, slider_urls, spec_value) values (#{name}, #{brandId}, #{category1Id}, #{category2Id}, #{category3Id}, #{unitName}, #{sliderUrls}, #{specValue})
mapper.update:
update product
name = #{name},
brand_Id = #{brandId},
category1_Id = #{category1Id},
category2_Id = #{category2Id},
category3_Id = #{category3Id},
unitName = #{unitName},
sliderUrls = #{sliderUrls},
specValue = #{specValue},
status = #{status},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
audit_message = #{auditMessage},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.*, b.name brandName , c1.name category1Name , c2.name category2Name , c2.name category3Name from product p left join brand b on p.brand_id = b.id left join category c1 on p.category1_id = c1.id left join category c2 on p.category2_id = c2.id left join category c3 on p.category3_id = c3.id where p.id = #{id}
